title: Draft Day Sports Pro Basketball 2016 Patch - SoN
description:
Game: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2016
Coded: March 4, 2016 by SoN
Type: Patch

Description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2016 gives you the chance for the ultimate in basketball armchair general managing. Take over your favorite team and draft, trade, sign free agents and make strategic decisions to set them on a course to be the next great dynasty in this career based simulation. Enjoy the immersive gameplay and rich almanac storing an archive worth of stats and records while you make the day to day decisions to guide your franchise to the top of the basketball world.

Instructions: This is just a basic patch. Install DDS:PB2016 as normal. Open the patch as admin. Click the "Browse" button and select the DDSPB2016.exe from the installation folder. Tick the "Make Backup" box if you want to make a backup of the original exe. Click the "Crack" button. That is it. Enjoy!

Notes: 
    Guy Mann: I was so out of my mind, I committed murder.
    Fox Mulder: Who did you kill?
    Guy Mann: A cow
